name: PrismTech
tag_list: middleware, software, integration, data-distribution-service, dds, corba, software-defined-radio, sdr, software-communications-architecture, sca, opensplice, spectra, openfusion
overview:
PrismTech Corporation is a provider of standards based, performance critical middleware.

PrismTech’s products and services include:

Spectra Software Defined Radio (SDR) and Software Communications Architecture (SCA) solutions: Spectra CX a model-driven development tool that simplifies, accelerates, and validates the SDR/SCA development process; Spectra CF a high performance, low footprint, COTS SCA Core Framework; Spectra CDB a fully integrated and optimized SDR middleware stack running across a wide range of FPGA, DSP and GPP processing elements; Spectra DTP - a wideband, high performance, baseband and RF SDR Development and test platform.

OpenSplice DDS a commercial and open source implementation of the OMG Data Distribution Service for Real-Time Systems (DDS) standard. OpenSplice DDS has experienced swift adoption in a variety of application domains characterized by the need to distribute high volumes of data with predictable low latencies, such as, Radar Processors, Flying and Land Drones, Combat Management Systems, Air Traffic Management, High Performance Telemetry, Large Scale Supervisory Systems, and Automated Stocks and Options Trading.

OpenFusion a comprehensive range of CORBA middleware products from ultra-low-profile ORBs on FPGAs and DSPs for embedded computing, through to fully featured Real-Time ORBs for the most demanding enterprise systems.

The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts. It has operations in Boston, Massachusetts, as well as in the United Kingdom, Germany, the Netherlands, and France. PrismTech Corporation operates as a subsidiary of PrismTech Holdings Ltd.
